definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Xiao Cai sheds light on the realities of pricing at Guanghua Market.
sentences.chinese: 小蔡一语道破光华商家的订价策略。

sentences.english: She also works as the deputy director of Academic Programs Office at Guanghua School of Management, Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 她也是北京大学光华管理学院学术项目办公室副主任。

sentences.english: After his graduation from Guanghua Vniversity in 1938, he left shanghai for Yan'an.
sentences.chinese: 1938年在光华大学毕业后告别上海，奔向延安。

sentences.english: Professor Zhang Weiying, Dean, Guanghua School of Management, Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 张维迎教授，院长，北京大学光华管理学院。

sentences.english: I met Xiaoguo in Guang Hua Road last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，我在光华路遇到了小郭。

sentences.english: Each angel shines a spirit bright, that overcomes our sadness.
sentences.chinese: 每个天使发射出一种心灵的光华，克服了我们的悲伤。

sentences.english: It is an irradiating magic difficult to qualify.
sentences.chinese: 那是一种光华四散的魔法，难以言状。

sentences.english: My laptop crashed the other day, so I went to the Kwang Hwa shopping area.
sentences.chinese: 我的笔电前几天挂掉了，所以我去了光华商场一趟。

sentences.english: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
sentences.chinese: 你能在他们的面目上认识恩泽的光华。

sentences.english: I thought about Carrollton Sunray Chinese School.
sentences.chinese: 我想到有光华中文学校。

sentences.english: Ten years ago, Guanghua launched an Executive MBA program.
sentences.chinese: 十年前，光华开办了EMBA项目。

sentences.english: The moon pales the stars with her brilliance.
sentences.chinese: 月光以她的光华使星星黯然失色。

sentences.english: In April 1957, the school accepted the government full grants-in-aid.
sentences.chinese: 一九五七四月，光华学校接受政府拨款资助。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
divine light (around the Buddha)/a halo/a miraculous column of light/(slang) jolly good!
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
